description:
As a Business Analyst for the Marketing/Sales Development track, you will work directly with Google Cloud teams to optimize processes for the organization's selling systems and strategy initiatives. You'll be responsible for the business process architecture of an enterprise sized program focused on re-imagining the business processes and systems across marketing, sales, support and partners.

Google Cloud helps millions of employees and organizations empower their employees, serve their customers, and build what’s next for their business — all with technology built in the cloud. Our products are engineered for security, reliability and scalability, running the full stack from infrastructure to applications to devices and hardware. And our teams are dedicated to helping our customers — developers, small and large businesses, educational institutions and government agencies — see the benefits of our technology come to life.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.
qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience
  • 3 years of experience in a Business Analyst/Program/Portfolio Management role.
  • 3 years of experience working in CRM and/or supporting a global marketing or sales organization, Salesforce.com experience.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience in B2B marketing and lead management.
  • Experience in Salesforce.com, Marketo, Sales Cloud, and SQL.
  • Understanding of marketing and sales business objectives.
  • Ability to develop and translate business requirements to functional requirements, identify gaps and execute testing of new, or modified, systems functionality or rules
  • Ability to drive the end-to-end life-cycle of developing integration solutions.
  • Developed communication and problem solving skills with the ability to articulate solutions to business stakeholders.
responsibilities:
• Create business requirement documents, user stories, functional specifications, and user acceptance test scenarios.
  • Lead sessions to gather requirements using interviews, document analysis, requirements workshops, surveys, site visits, business process descriptions, use cases, business analysis, architecture diagrams and task/workflow analysis
  • Work closely with members of the global Google Cloud Sales and extended teams including but not limited to Engineering, Business Intelligence, Sales and Data Governance to identify and build solutions and processes.
  • Understand, design and implement configuration and workflow for new processes and systems that maximize functionality and minimize customization.
title: Marketing Business Process Analyst, Cloud Business Transformation Organization
